co.templex.banbot.discord

Class LogWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.templex.banbot.discord.LogWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LogWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    LogWatcher class. Instances of this class will watch minecraft log files continuously until shutdown.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Bot bot
      The bot instance to which this log reports.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger logger
      The logger instance for all instances of LogWatcher.
      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService watchServiceExecutor
      The single-threaded executor on which this watcher watches.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogWatcher(Bot bot)
      Main constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void checkLineForBanlistModification(java.lang.String line)
      Checks the line passed for a banlist modification.
      private void discardUntilEnd(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      Helper method to discard all previous entries (server is mid-execution, bot is just starting execution).
      void run()
      Main watcher instructions.
      void shutdown()
      Shuts down the watcher and its internal threads.

      Initiates the watcher.

    • Field Detail

      • logger

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger logger
        The logger instance for all instances of LogWatcher. This serves solely for debug purposes.

      • bot

        private final Bot bot
        The bot instance to which this log reports.

      • watchServiceExecutor

        The single-threaded executor on which this watcher watches.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogWatcher

        LogWatcher(@NonNull
           Bot bot)
        Main constructor. A bot instance must be passed in order for reporting to be valid.
        Parameters:
        bot - The bot instance which this log watcher refers to.

    • Method Detail

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Shuts down the watcher and its internal threads.

      • watch

        public void watch()
        Initiates the watcher.

      • run

        public void run()
        Main watcher instructions. A buffered reader updates to ensure that the bottom of the log is always watched.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • discardUntilEnd

        private void discardUntilEnd(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Helper method to discard all previous entries (server is mid-execution, bot is just starting execution).
        Parameters:
        reader - Reader to discard all previous entries from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error in the reader.

      • checkLineForBanlistModification

        private void checkLineForBanlistModification(java.lang.String line)
        Checks the line passed for a banlist modification. If the line matches the result of a /ban or /pardon execution, it will report so to the appropriate location.
        Parameters:
        line - The line to check against.
